Retrieve lag between collection and submission

Source: R/getLag.R
getLag.Rd

Retrieve daily lag between collection and submission by location

getLag(location = NULL)

Arguments

location:

(optional) a location name (if not specified, daily lag globally returned)

Value

dataframe

Examples

getLag(location="California")

#> Retrieving data... 
#>    date_collected date_submitted total_count    lag
#> 1      2020-09-09     2020-09-09           1 0 days
#> 2      2020-11-14     2020-11-14           1 0 days
#> 3      2020-12-07     2020-12-07           1 0 days
